traits.Keen Hearing and Smell: The worg has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13+1d4 + 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
